socialMedia.title: Social Media Management
socialMedia.heroSubtitle: Building a loyal community around your brand through strategic content that ensures continuous engagement
socialMedia.description: At Pure Marketing, we don't just manage your accounts; we create a 'personality' for your brand that speaks and interacts. We believe that social platforms are the bridge of trust between you and your audience; so we design comprehensive content strategies aimed at transforming silent followers into a loyal community that promotes your brand itself.

methodology.title: Our Methodology (How Do We Make the Difference?)

step1.title: Compass Analysis
step1.description: Precise study of your target audience and competitor analysis in the Saudi and Gulf market.

step2.title: Strategy Design
step2.description: Defining the Tone of Voice and editorial line that suits your brand.

step3.title: Creative Content Creation
step3.description: Writing content (Copywriting) and designs that keep up with trends and serve your goals.

step4.title: Engagement & Community
step4.description: Managing comments and messages and building a strong relationship with the audience.

step5.title: Purity Reports
step5.description: Providing you with transparent periodic reports measuring engagement and growth.

paidAds.title: Paid Advertising Campaigns
paidAds.heroSubtitle: Smart campaigns on all platforms that guarantee you the highest return on ad spend (ROAS)
paidAds.description: We don't spend your budget, we invest it. We focus our campaigns on (Instagram, Snapchat, TikTok, and Google) to reach the quality customer ready to make a purchase decision. We use precise data to target the audience based on their purchasing behavior, ensuring the highest return on advertising spend (ROAS).

step1.title: Goal Setting
step1.description: Is the goal brand awareness, increased sales, or direct bookings?

step2.title: Campaign Structure
step2.description: Designing the customer journey (Funnel) and choosing the most suitable platforms for each goal.

step3.title: Testing & Optimization (A/B Testing)
step3.description: Launching multiple ad models and monitoring performance moment by moment to choose the most successful.

step4.title: Smart Budget Management
step4.description: Distributing the budget intelligently to reduce cost per click and increase conversions.

step5.title: Absolute Transparency
step5.description: Direct access for the client to campaign results through a real-time dashboard.

motionGraphics.title: Video Editing & Motion Graphics
motionGraphics.heroSubtitle: Transforming your ideas into visual and cinematic stories that captivate attention and remain in memory
motionGraphics.description: In the age of visual content, the first second is decisive. We provide cinematic excellence that transforms your complex message into an exciting video that takes your breath away. Whether it's an explanatory motion graphics video or cinematic editing for your ads, we guarantee you visual quality that gives your brand exceptional prestige.

step1.title: Brainstorming & Script
step1.description: Writing a scenario that touches customer emotions and clarifies the added value.

step2.title: Storyboard
step2.description: Visualizing scenes before starting implementation to ensure matching your vision.

step3.title: Creative Execution
step3.description: Animating graphics or editing shots with the latest global technologies.

step4.title: Sound Engineering
step4.description: Choosing music and voiceover appropriate for the brand identity.

step5.title: Final Output
step5.description: Delivering a video ready for publishing in 4K quality suitable for all platforms.

websites.title: Websites & E-commerce
websites.heroSubtitle: Designing a smooth user experience that converts visitors into actual customers with a single click
websites.description: Your store is your facade to the world, and we build it to be a selling machine that works non-stop. We don't just focus on aesthetic appearance, but we pay utmost attention to user experience (UI/UX) and browsing speed, ensuring a smooth purchasing journey that ends with pressing the 'Order Completed' button.

step1.title: Needs Analysis
step1.description: Understanding the type of products and the ideal customer journey within the site.

step2.title: Structural Design
step2.description: Building a modern and attractive user interface (UI) consistent with visual identity.

step3.title: Technical Integration
step3.description: Connecting the store with payment gateways (Mada, Apple Pay) and leading shipping companies.

step4.title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
step4.description: Preparing the site to top search results and bring free visits.

step5.title: Training & Support
step5.description: Delivering an easy control panel and training your team to manage orders and inventory.
